channel.title: deep-learning on Matt's blog
channel.description: Recent content in deep-learning on Matt's blog

item.title: Neural Nets Aren't Black Boxes
item.description: If you think neural nets are black boxes, you’re certainly not alone. While they may not be as interpretable as something like a random forest (at least not yet), we can still understand how they process data to arrive at their predictions. In this post we’ll do just that as we build our own network from scratch, starting with logistic regression. This post is very much inspired by this fantastic post by Sylvain Gugger.
